title: Type - Schedule-driven Vesting Condition
description: Type representation of a row in a vesting schedule

amount_numerator.description: Numerator of the tranche amount (e.g. 1 in 1/48th)

amount_denominator.description: Denominator of the tranche amount (e.g. 48 in 1/48th)

period_length.description: Length of period following the vesting start date for this tranche

priority.description: What order should this period be calculated (1 is highest priority)

dependent_vesting.title: Schedule-driven Vesting Condition - Dependent Vesting Conditions Array
dependent_vesting.description: Vesting periods or conditions which become operative once this condition is met
